release.note: Adds two new buttons, Expand and Contract, to the Project Browser, otherwise known as the Solution Explorer.
Adds a new button to the Solution (ProjectBrowser) toolbar – Close Solution.
Preparing for public release of source code. Making the VS project work without dependencies, adding docs, etc
Expand/Contract buttons switched so they are in the same sequence as in the `PropertyGridExtras <http://clarionaddins.com/addins/PropertyGridExtras.html>`_ addin.
Locator added to the toolbar! Enter a 'starts with' term and hit enter to locate it withing the solution tree.
Locator now falls back to a contains search if the starts-with fails.
Now has ClarionAddins global addin dependency.
